archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Activate Product
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Brief Description Activate a product which is typically done after it has been configured or any required services and/or resources have been configured and activated. Extended Description Activate Product activates a product, which is typically done after it has been configured or any required services and/or resources have been configured and activated. Processes responsible for activating services and resources provide activation notification to this process.
